<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Multiplies a [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) and a [Vector3](class_vector3.md) within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A multiplication operation on a transform (4Ã—4 matrix) and a vector, with support for different multiplication operators.

[Operator](class_visualshadernodetransformvecmult.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_Operator) **OP_AxB** = `0`

Multiplies transform ``a`` by the vector ``b``.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_constant_OP_BxA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](class_visualshadernodetransformvecmult.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_Operator) **OP_BxA** = `1`

Multiplies vector ``b`` by the transform ``a``.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_constant_OP_3x3_AxB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](class_visualshadernodetransformvecmult.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_Operator) **OP_3x3_AxB** = `2`

Multiplies transform ``a`` by the vector ``b``, skipping the last row and column of the transform.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_constant_OP_3x3_BxA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](class_visualshadernodetransformvecmult.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_Operator) **OP_3x3_BxA** = `3`

Multiplies vector ``b`` by the transform ``a``, skipping the last row and column of the transform.<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_constant_OP_MAX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[Operator](class_visualshadernodetransformvecmult.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeTransformVecMult_Operator) **OP_MAX** = `4`
